snippet: With just days before several primaries where she will depend on the loyalty of female and black voters in Florida, North Carolina and the Midwest, Hillary Clinton got some heavyweight help from Hollywood in ads starring Shonda Rhimes, Kerry Washington, Ellen Pompeo and Viola Davis
abstract: With just days before several primaries where she will depend on the loyalty of female and black voters in Florida, North Carolina and the Midwest, Hillary Clinton got some heavyweight help from Hollywood in ads starring Shonda Rhimes, Kerry Washington, Ellen Pompeo and Viola Davis

headline.main: Hillary Clinton Gets Some Star Power to Help in New Ads
headline.print_headline: ‘Real Life’ Voices; Clinton Gets Some Star Power to Help in Ads in Primary States
